name: Du Bois Hotel Les Houches Chamonix

reviews.text: Third year on a trot. It gets better and better. Whilst the skiing is limited. Loads of snow not too many people on the slopes. Exchange rate against the Brits but still good value for money. Food excellent.
reviews.title: Third year running - excellent value great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used this for an overnight stop in late summer (very cold, though, that high up!). It was fine for that - quite convenient near the Mont Blanc tunnel (good view), not far from the main road. Also convenient for the town, which has some basic shopping plus bars and restaurants - we ate at Le Beau Site and had an excellent meal. The room was modest, dated decor; small bathroom. Indoor pool looked inviting. Reception/staff etc. were OK. On-site parking.
reviews.title: Reasonable summer overnighter

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Du Bois is a lovely little hotel in the village of Les Houches, Chamonix. This is a relatively typical 3* ski hotel, but receives the excellent rating based on the following:
reviews.title: Superb hotel with great service
Great Ski Hotel with EU plan food
reviews.text: - Great staff on reception, always ready to help

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great Location for the Slopes

reviews.text: - Lovely bar area with helpful bar staff
reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
